definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Idealized research methods to solve the historiography of measurement was first crisis.
sentences.chinese: 理想化的研究方法首先解決了計量史學的危機。

sentences.english: Because it can precisely dose the raw materials, we can ensure the quality.
sentences.chinese: 因計量準確，能有效地保證粉煤灰或灰砂磚的質量。

sentences.english: It raises its own viewpoints to terseness and containment of econometrics models.
sentences.chinese: 對計量經濟模型的簡潔性和包容性提出了自己的觀點。

sentences.english: The intragroup difference of measurement data was detected with the t test.
sentences.chinese: 組間計量資料差異性測定採用t檢驗。

sentences.english: The statistic methods were t-test and the correlation analysis.
sentences.chinese: 運用t檢驗和相關分析對計量指標進行統計學分析。

sentences.english: The measurement devices used in hydrologic monitoring shall pass the inspection according to law.
sentences.chinese: 水文監測所使用的計量器具應當依法經檢定合格。

sentences.english: The fair value of the assets received or surrendered can be measured reliably.
sentences.chinese: 換入資產或換出資產的公允價值能夠可靠地計量。

sentences.english: This paper analyses the significance and influence of just value measurement.
sentences.chinese: 本文對公允價值計量的意義及影響加以庥析。

sentences.english: The intensity of infection may be an essential factor that affects the intra-individual variation of egg counts.
sentences.chinese: 感染度是影響蟲卵計量個體內變異的根本原因。

sentences.english: It is arbitrary to negate the probability of the measurement to real income absolutely.
sentences.chinese: 徹底否定真實收益的現實計量可能性是過於武斷的。

sentences.english: Bend degree is a basic unit to measure tonal arch degree.
sentences.chinese: 折度是計量聲調曲拱的基本單位。

sentences.english: Provides calibration method for the available pyranometers in the PV market.
sentences.chinese: 針對市場上現有類型的總輻射表提供了計量測試方法。

sentences.english: Ancient Chinese people measured time with sundials.
sentences.chinese: 中國古代使用日規計量時間。
它是時間計量器的形狀。

sentences.english: L(J)MZD-1.14SYDanti-electricity stealingmetering box is specially designed for users of oil field.
sentences.chinese: 14SYD型防竊電計量箱專爲油田用戶設計。

sentences.english: The study of the thesis is the core of heat metering and charging.
sentences.chinese: 本文的研究內容是熱計量收費工作的核心部分。

definition: norm/standard/standard of reference/base/base point/base line/benchmark/reference point/reference frame/criterion/data
to determine the recipient of an award through discussion
to stake out (the boundaries of a property etc)/to demarcate/(engineering etc) to calibrate
public utility/state-run enterprise/public foundation or enterprise, often charitable
